House of Eraz0158732raquidmad00m1xci8wyv8o1f9emj4n1057122013-10-05T07:12:41ZGonzalo848331{{Quote|Now comes the noble Razdal mo Eraz, of that ancient and honorable house.|[[Missandei]]|The Bear and the Maiden Fair (episode)}}

The '''House of Eraz''' is one of the noble [[Slavery|slaver]] families from the city of [[Yunkai]].
